name: Turbo Pug Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

short_description: Enjoy the soundtrack compilation from all of the Turbo Pug games. Composed by Felix Arifin.
